alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, south central St. Johns and northeastern Putnam Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Federal Point, or over Hastings, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hastings, East Palatka, Orange Mills, Federal Point, San Mateo and Spuds. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
